long_description: The REI Micro shower kit is perfect for those who seek to carry their essentials in an easy-to-access, low-profile kit-plus, it saves significant weight and space. Single straight zipper provides easy top and side access to main compartment; exterior zip pocket allows access to small items. Interior zippered pocket has a water-resistant liner to separate wet and dry items. Kit's low-profile side handle lets you grab and go without hassle. Durable nylon resists abrasions, tears, scuffs and punctures.
short_description: The REI Micro shower kit is perfect for those who seek to carry their essentials in an easy-to-access, low-profile kit-plus, it saves significant weight and space.
